website_summaries.verdict: An extremely rugged pair of winter gloves. They distance themselves from the competition on almost all fronts: warmth, waterproof design, and brilliant construction.
pros: Waterproof exterior, 3M Thinsulate lining, and drawstring wrists
These thick gloves keep hands warm in the coldest wintry conditions and snow play
cons: May cause hands to sweat -  which isn't a major issues if your top concern is warmth for winter activities

customer_reviews.title: nice cord to tighten them at the wrist
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son average hand size.his middle finger from nuckle to tip measures 3 inch,hope this helps you for sizing.there is room to grow in, which leave some wiggle room.nice cord to tighten them at the wrist.color is vibrant red.really quality material.glad I got the right size.size small. Fleece linned.great grip material.heavy stitched.water proof oh yes.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Warm and water resistant
customer_reviews.text: LUV LUV LUV!! So soft, water resistant and my son loves the vibrant colors!! He has already used them in the snow and he had no complaints!! We are very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cbwonder99

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my 11 year old nephew. The fit him well. If there was another size bigger, i would have ordered that as these may only last for this winter. His hands are too small for adults. Other that that, they are warm and very comfortable. Great Purchase. Great material
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: I went with the sizing that was listed for these ...
customer_reviews.text: I went with the sizing that was listed for these gloves and bought the Medium for my 9 year old boy and they are too big. He still loves them and wears them everyday anyway. I think the small would have been the correct size to buy for him though. They keep his hands warm and dry in the snow. I haven't had any issues with the inside getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: but nice gloves otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Big for my 7 y/o son, but nice gloves otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Small 7-year-old, gloves too large but quality fine
customer_reviews.text: An inch and a half of glove left beyond my grandson's fingers. He is small for his age, but is 7 years old, so I bought the small size. I wish they offered extra-small. The quality seems fine, they just run big. We are keeping them, too-large gloves are better than no water-proof gloves at all! I hope they are not lost before next winter!
customer_reviews.author: kneejammer59

customer_reviews.title: Cute and nice quality kids' ski gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice-looking, two-toned pair of kids' ski gloves. The gloves are lightweight and are well-made/stitched. The outside material is a nice quality and the inside of the glove is soft and comfortable. On the underside, the palm to the fingers is made of synthetic leather for better grip and on the back of the hand, there is small piece of soft fabric above the thumb for cleaning goggle lenses. For a better fit and to keep the warmth in and snow out, there is elastic around the wrist as well as an elastic drawstring closure at the opening of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: NWMTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice cozy inside. .Size is little large for 5 year old as i bought 4-6 size I think my kid can wear it untill my kid will be 7 year old .
customer_reviews.author: N.p

customer_reviews.title: I just purchased these for a back up because my ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these for a back up because my son always tends to loose a glove. They look very well made and feel very warm/cozy.
customer_reviews.author: A Kool

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Company doesn't accept returns unless the product is damaged. If it doesn't fit, it's not considered "their fault". I got exactly the size I needed for my daughter and she is average, so it is not MY fault, they are not true to size. If you have a doubt, not worth the try, you might get stuck with a expensive pair of useless gloves. Since the company didn't give us a chance to try them and review them, therefore 1 star from us.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for myself
customer_reviews.text: I don't have big hands or long fingers so kids gloves are usually a better pick. Plus I really wanted these for the full put palms as I wanted them to build a snow dragon. They held up beautifully and kept my hands nice and warm in 10" of snow. The quality seems fine and I like that I can pull the string and tighten them over my jacket to keep the snow out!
customer_reviews.author: G. Burk

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to put on and great gloves for kids
customer_reviews.text: We are planning to go on a ski trip so we need to get a good glove for my son. It fit a little big but it will be fit great in two to 3 months later since kids hand grow faster. The quality on these gloves are great and it's better than other big brands. Winter is coming too so it will be great to wear to play snow. Overall, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LouisF

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof..not even a little
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves because I have tried nearly every other brand and can't find any that are truly waterproof. I realize that after some time, wetness may get into the glove and cause it to be a bit damp; however, these went from dry to wet quicker than any other glove we've tried. My son used these for two hours while sledding with friends and they were soaked completely through. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Home run
customer_reviews.text: My nine-year-old daughter really likes these gloves for skiing. I ordered a size L (10-12). I would say the sizing is accurate as my daughter is very tall and the fit was good for her. She found them to be pretty warm. No complaints from her. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy92660

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I stuck these under the tap to see if they were waterproof and they were. We haven't had super cold weather yet to truly test them, but they are comfortable according to my daughter and she likes the soft spot on there for her nose.
customer_reviews.author: Lilender

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves! We haven’t had a big snow yet but we’ve already had a few below freezing days and my son said they kept his hands warm. I ordered a medium for my seven year old and they are big but manageable. This was definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MiaPrier

customer_reviews.title: Solid Winter Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome, fit my daughter perfectly! They arrived very quickly and look and feel great! The insides are soft with fleece lining, and the gloves allow for easy movement in the fingers, they aren’t stiff like some other gloves we’ve had in the past. We also like the band around the wrists that you can make tighter to help keep the snow out. Haven’t wore them on the snow yet, so we’ll see how they hold up with the water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Toasty
customer_reviews.text: Received gloves in new condition. The gloves are a little big for my nine-year-old daughter. But they are very comfortable she said they are very soft on both the outside and the inside. The quality seems to be very good and we shall see how they last with a nine-year-old. I will update at the end of the winter. At this time I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (10) had warm comfortable hands up until her sweaty hands separated the liner from the shell as she pulled her hands out of the glove. This wouldn’t be an issue if it was simple to reinsert the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Easy E

customer_reviews.title: warm but runs large and bulky
customer_reviews.text: It can keep your kid warm in the new England winter but it runs large so my 4.5 years don't really like to put it on. I did not return it because I'd like to see if my son can use it when he is older
customer_reviews.author: luke222

customer_reviews.title: Nice Winter Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Just received these gloves for my son for this upcoming winter. The gloves look nice and seem warm. Can't speak yet to how waterproof or durable they are; I'll try to update in a few months after we've dealt with snow for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality poor fit
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are obviously well insulated and sturdy, however my very petite 5 and 7 year old are unable to get their finders to slide completely into the ends of the finger tips. It's too tight.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond warm!
customer_reviews.text: Kept hands toasty for 2 hours in negative wind chill conditions
customer_reviews.author: Deepfreez

customer_reviews.title: Inside glove liner came out and wouldn’t go back into place
customer_reviews.text: My son wore them snowboarding and they seemed to keep his hands warm, but they didn’t even last more than one day since the inside liner got pulled out after taking the gloves off a few times. Once they were inside out it was impossible to get the liner back into the fingers. We tried forever and eventually gave up and the gloves became useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, kept the kiddos warm and dry for two snowboard trips. They seem to be well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonjrock

customer_reviews.title: very warm and confortable
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 8 year boy and he really likes it. it is very comfortable and warm.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star

customer_reviews.title: Great snow gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting gloves and worked well. My son loves them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JesuslovesBritt

They look warm though, we haven’t worn them in snow yet.

customer_reviews.title: Can never have enough
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are small on me but I think they will fit my grandson. They seem very nice and warm and well made. The inside is nice and cozy.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small - if you're unsure, I'd order a size up.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves for my daughters!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality gloves for my daughters! They are 9 and 12 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: They were a little big for my child by seems good to be use next winter season : )

customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. At least they will last till next year for my son.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves for kids. No complaints from my kid while wearing them!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ski gloves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves for myself (an adult with small hands). They fit perfectly and don't have extra finger room sticking out like other gloves that I own do. They are nice and warm and are comfortable. The ends have a draw string that pulls tight to prevent snow from getting inside when snowboarding or skiing. they look and feel great on my hands.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are good, however dont fit quite to size it states.

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 y/o niece and the 10-12 fit was too large for her

customer_reviews.title: Stinky hands
customer_reviews.text: These gloves developed a very stinky odor inside the very first time my son wore them. The gloves are warm so he sweats a bit in them but even with us hanging them on a boot dryer nightly and washing them, they make his hands smell horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We are a -snow-playing-winter-loving-minnesota family. After 45 minutes of outside play, in 20 degrees above zero weather, my son's fingers are red and he's complaining they feel frozen. Had to warm them up in lukewarm water. Don't buy these if you want to play outside for long periods of time in weather below 40.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: These gloves fit my 9 year old son fine. But they were horrible in the cold
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit my 9 year old son fine. But they were horrible in the cold. He wore them for 30 min in 15 degree weather and almost got frost bite. I would not recommend these gloves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty manufacturing in our gloves
customer_reviews.text: The inner linings of the gloves are not secure. Within 1 week of regular use, the inner lining is balled up and unable to fit back inside the glove. They are unusable. Very disappointing. The company says the manufacturing fault is not common. They did refund the purchase price. We appreciate the positive customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Fiala

customer_reviews.title: Great kids winter gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son was super happy to get these. He says they are warm and comfortable. We haven’t had snow yet so I can’t comment on their waterproof ability yet but will update if they fall short. Otherwise great experience!
customer_reviews.author: debelmontkid

M (7-9 years): under 6" from bottom of palm to fingertips, glove length 8.25" with 2.25" woven cuff
L (10-12 years): under 6.5" from bottom of palm to fingertips, glove length 8.75" with 2.25" woven cuff

Package Includes:
1 x Pair of Gloves

Soft-coated fabric surfaces on backs of hands for scratch-free goggle/lens wiping

Heavy, reinforced stitching in areas prone to wear and tear
